YO SOY UNA PERSONA QUE TIENE UNO DE ESTOS NEGOCIOS Y QUIERO EXPANDIRLO MAS ,SE TRATA DE UN MINI MARQUERT O TIENDA DE BARRIO Y QUISIERA QUE USTDES ME TUVIERAN EN CUENTA PARA UN CREDITO, MI NEGOCIO ESTA UBICADO EN COLOMBIA DEPARTAMENTO DE NARIÑO - IPIALES DONDE LOS CREDITOS SON DIFICILES DE CONSEGIR YA QUE EN LOS BANCOS PIDEN MUCHO GARANTIA Y NO HAY POSIBILIDADES POR ESO ME DIRIGO A USTEDES PARA QUE SE ME TENGA EN CONSIDERACION. EL CREDITO QUE NECESITO DE USTEDES ES DE UN MONTO DE 2.500 DOLARES,PARA EXPANDIR MI TIENDA PUES DE ELLA DEPENDEN MI FAMILIA Y YO, PARA CUALQUIER INQUIETUD O DUDA FAVOR COMUNICARSE CONMIGO AL CELULAR 317 3519124 YA UQE UN TELEFONO FIJO NO TENGO TAMBIEN COLOCO MI DIRRECION QUE ES MANZANA A CASA Nº8 URBANIZACION GARCIA HERREROS IPIALES -NARIÑO. lenders.name: Wendy Salpeter
lenders.loan_because: This is one of my own personal charity choices.  Kiva is a non-profit organization doing micro-financing for people in need all over the world.  I like to give back where I can.  I am so proud, I have had no one default on paying me back !
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Mortgage Loan Originator in the USA and Broker doing  discounted low rate loans for homes in the USA. Just mention Kiva ! Kiva credits are available at closing. Changing the world one loan at a time !

lenders.name: brian
lenders.loan_because: To give others opportunity and hope for something better for themselves.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a great way to help people help themselves.  I love it!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 12, 15, and 18 year old students history lessons.  I am especially interested in sustainable growth and helping students understand the coming challenges of the 21st century as demand for fossil fuels outstrips supply.  Kiva is one way to help individuals and build the local economies that will be so necessary in the futre.  I'm also interested in sustainable agriculture and hope to spread management intensive grazing.  In my free time, I work as a real estate agent and try to educate people about sustainable communities and lifestyles other than the sprawl so rampant in the U.S. today.

lenders.name: Jeff & Megan
lenders.loan_because: Direct lending is awesome!
lenders.occupational_info: I help run a public middle school for children ages 11-14.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student and after that I want to work in a daycare for children.

lenders.name: Layla & Kamran
